name: AmigaLander (PICO8) by Toolkitman
description:
This is the famous Lander game I have developed from a bought tutorial and mod to make an AMIGA style game. Try to correctly land your Amiga Shuttle over the Amiga base and win!!!   

-Toolkitman https://matteo-trevisan.itch.io/amiga-lander
